mapper.select: SELECT acct_number FROM account WHERE mem_id=#{mem_id} AND r_num = (SELECT max(r_num) FROM account where mem_id=#{mem_id})
mapper.update: INSERT INTO acct_charge( charge_code, mem_id, acct_number, charge_amount, user_bank, apply_date,status) VALUES( (SELECT dbms_random.string('U',2)||LPAD(ROUND(dbms_random.value(1,10000)),4,0) FROM dual) ,#{mem_id},#{acct_number},#{price},#{user_bank} ,(SELECT TO_CHAR(SYSDATE, 'yyyy/mm/dd/hh24/mi/ss') FROM DUAL) ,'대기' )
mapper.select: SELECT acct_balance, acct_dealdate, tr_ammount, tr ,tr_detail,tr_target FROM account WHERE mem_id=#{mem_id} AND hidden='no'
SELECT acct_balance FROM account d, (SELECT mem_id, MAX(r_num) r_num FROM account GROUP BY mem_id) c WHERE d.mem_id = #{mem_id} AND d.mem_id = c.mem_id AND d.r_num = c.r_num
SELECT acct_balance FROM account WHERE mem_id =#{mem_id} AND r_num=(SELECT max(r_num) FROM account)
SELECT charge_code, mem_id, trade_ammount, user_bank ,acct_number, apply_date, deposit_date, approval_date, status FROM acct_charge WHERE status='대기'
mapper.update: UPDATE acct_charge SET status='승인' ,deposit_date = (SELECT to_char(sysdate,('yyyy/mm/dd/hh24/mi/ss')) FROM dual) ,approval_date = (SELECT to_char(sysdate,('yyyy/mm/dd/hh24/mi/ss')) FROM dual) WHERE charge_code = #{charge_code}
